message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $1,000,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I'm not willing to pay $1,000,000. I'm willing to pay $750,000 for the product, considering its value and potential benefits to my business.

Bob, I understand your position, but $750,000 is too low for me to consider.  This product offers significant value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. How about we meet in the middle at $925,000?

I understand your concerns, Alice, but $925,000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $875,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.
